meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive J Cheema Jennifer Hoosier Mary Ann Borer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7870.

td.p: J Cheema, a marketing and strategy consultant from Portland, Oregon
Jennifer Hoosier, a university administrator from Tucker, Georgia
Mary Ann Borer, a marketing coordinator from Pomona, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $86,500)

tr.td: VISITING ATLANTA
THE DAYTIME EMMYS
GOVERNORS
BATTLES OF THE AMERICAN REVOLUTION
COSTS A LITTLE EXTRA
ONE I IS ENOUGH
(Alex: Each correct response will have only one "I" as its vowel.)

Mary Ann
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Jennifer] I can\'t read the second.)
(Jennifer: It was going to be "the one in 1964".)
...
(Alex: [To J] Mexico City and Moscow were the other two cities.)
JenniferWhat are Munich + the one in 196
$5,000
JWhat is Munich and Montreal?
$14,000
Mary AnnWhat are Milan + Milwaukee?
$1,000
Munich and Montreal')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Of the 4 "M" cities that consecutively hosted Summer Olympics in the 20th century, these 2 aren\'t national capitals')

tr.td: OLYMPIC CITIES
Of the 4 "M" cities that consecutively hosted Summer Olympics in the 20th century, these 2 aren't national capitals
Mary Ann
Jennifer
J
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $28,000
Mary Ann
Jennifer
J

14 R
(including 3 DDs),
1 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
